summary: Recruit Karbjorn to aid in your adventures.
descriptionHtml:
Travelling all over Tamriel, a brave nord finds himself back in Skyrim at the Sleeping Giant Inn. While resting and having a mug of mead, a wanderer catches his eye...

In this mod you have the option of recruiting Karbjorn to aid you in battle. This mod is currently a very early work in progress and still has planned features not yet implemented.

Planned Features:

- Richer back storyÂ 

- More in depth dialogue
author: Carizzma
